message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $10000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  I'm happy to pay $8000 for it.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $9500. This is my best price for now.
